programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
programme.desc: Shinnosuke and companions awaken after 100 years of hibernation. Soon, they realise their last shared memory is a mall parking lot, and the group collaborates to get back to Earth.

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
programme.desc: Shinnosuke and Ellen witness a small ship's sudden explosion, questioning the motive. Meanwhile, Hiroshi discovers a mysterious door.

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
programme.desc: When Hiroshi retrieves a 100-year-old Soda Gold bottle, hungry Shinnosuke attempts to drink it. Later, they discover a pillar of sweet, jelly-like food.

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
programme.desc: Mr Smith is Jiro Jailbreaker, an 800-year fugitive controlling all the food. Meanwhile, Takosuke butters up Jailbreaker for rations, and Hiroshi pleads for his family's share.

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
programme.desc: When Micchi and Yoshirin miss roll call, Shinnosuke and the others go looking for them. However, they discover that the number of capsules does not correspond to the number of people on board.

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
programme.desc: Shiro suddenly enlarges, causing Jailbreaker to suspect him as the alien. Meanwhile, Hiroshi suggests a method to identify humans as Shiro undergoes further transformation.

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
programme.desc: Paranoia grips everyone as Jailbreaker guards the food supply with a laser gun. Meanwhile, the situation suddenly shifts when Shinnosuke mentions seeing Chocobi snacks in a closed-off room.

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
programme.desc: Alien Buttman appears and reveals the humans on board are his food. After Buttman's attack, the group escapes to a food storage room where a robot takes Himawari hostage.

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
programme.desc: A tonsil robot emerges from the female shell, guiding the group's escape to Earth. Meanwhile, the mother ship begins to explode, and everyone race to the cockpit.

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
programme.desc: When Buttmen attack, chaos erupts, and Shinnosuke abandons Hiroshi to rescue Shiro. Shinnosuke's parents try to intervene, but a fire door separates him and the dog from the rest of the group.

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
